      • getContextsOf

        public static SynchronizedCollection<AgentContext> getContextsOf(Agent agent)
                                                          throws Exception
        Replies the contexts in which the agent is located.
        Parameters:
        agent - - the agent for which the contexts must be retreived.
        Returns:
        the contexts of the agents.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when it is not possible to retreive the contexts.

      • getContextIn

        public static AgentContext getContextIn(Agent agent)
                                 throws Exception
        Replies the inner context of the agent, if it was created.
        Parameters:
        agent - - the agent for which the inner context must be retreived.
        Returns:
        the inner context, or null.
        Throws:
        Exception - - when it is not possible to retreive the inner context.
